title: Random FPS drop then it goes back to normal - Laptop (i7 6700HQ, 960M 4gb, 8GB ram, Windows 10)
body: Hi. So i got this Laptop to play mostly League of Legends, and i set everything to the max setting (except vSync) and i play with 60+ FPS but every now and then i get like a FPS drop and then it comes back to normal. I have HUD Animations to off and the issue persists. I tried even running the laptop on High Performance mode and nothing. (Always plugged in to the electricty) My laptop specs. i7 6700HQ GT 960m 4GB vRam 8GB Ram 1TB HDD 5400RPM Anyone has any idea? what can i do. Drivers are updated.

replies.body: Your may have corrupt files or some form of hardware issue that may cause your FPS to drop.  Windows 10 also had a recent update, so some of your drivers may be outdated again.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, which will provide a series of troubleshooting steps.  This should get you fixed up!
